text: Raul García Gutierrez (born December 3, 1971 in Garrovillas, Cáceres) is a goalball athlete from Spain. He has a disability: he is blind and is a B2 type athlete. His job is working as a coupon seller. He played goalball at the 2000 Summer Paralympics. His team was third. He played goalball at the 2008 Summer Paralympics. His team was 12. == References == Category:Spanish goalball players Category:Living people Category:1971 births Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:People from Extremadura Category:2000 Summer Paralympics Category:2008 Summer Paralympics Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type B2
title: Raul García Gutierrez
